item.title: Big Buck Bunny Trailer
item.description: Big Buck Bunny is a short animated film by the Blender Institute. It is made using free and open source software.

item.title: Sintel Trailer
item.description: Sintel is a fantasy computer generated short movie. It's the third release from the Blender Open Movie Project.

item.title: Elephants Dream Trailer
item.description: Elephants Dream is the world's first open movie, made entirely with open source graphics software such as Blender.
